name: Check iframe
description: Firefox add-on that indicates if the current website uses an iframe by changing the color of the add-on icon. Resources: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/Add-ons/WebExtensions/Your_first_WebExtension, https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/Add-ons/WebExtensions/Your_second_WebExtension, https://github.com/mdn/webextensions-examples (bookmark-it, find-across-tabs...)
